document.full_text: the fate of the bahrain grand prix looked uncertain on tuesday after formula one teams opposed a controversial decision to reschedule the postponed race and commercial supremo bernie ecclestone suggested a fresh vote.
document.title: formula one mulls quick u-turn on bahrain
lines_and_colors: the fate of the bahrain grand prix looked uncertain on tuesday after formula one teams opposed a controversial decision to reschedule the postponed race and commercial supremo bernie ecclestone suggested a fresh vote.
